import { useEffect } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { getReviewsfromProduct } from "../store/review"; //VA A RECIBIR DIRECTAMENTE REVIEW DESDE SINGLECARD const Reviews = ({id}) => { const review = useSelector(state => state.reviews) const dispatch = useDispatch(); console.log("reviews", review) /* useEffect(()=>{ console.log("id re", id) dispatch( getReviewsfromProduct(id) ) },[]) */ //lo use despues const activesitems = review.slice(0, 2); const items = review.slice(2, review.length); return (

{activesitems[0].comment}

{items.map((coment, i) => (

{coment.comment}

))}
); }; export default Reviews;
